sentences.sentence: You said we're a team. One person struggles, we all struggle. One player triumphs, we all triumph, right?
sentences.translation: 你曾经说过我们是一个队伍，共同进退，一荣俱荣。

sentences.sentence: Climb mountains not so the world can see you, but so you can see the world.
sentences.translation: 爬上山顶并不是为了让世界看到你，而是为了让你看到整个世界。

sentences.sentence: As a body everyone is single, as a soul never.
sentences.translation: 每个人的身体都是独立的，但灵魂从来不是。

sentences.sentence: When a friendship is real, you can feel it.
sentences.translation: 交到真心朋友的时候，你是可以感觉到的。

sentences.sentence: Please don't hesitate to ask me if you don't understand.
sentences.translation: 不明白的时候，请随时问我。
